name: Louisiana Chicken & Rice

ingredients.name: Louisiana Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: Place rice and water in Multipurpose Steamer. Top with tray; microwave, uncovered, on high for 16–18 minutes, or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken fillets and cook 6–8 min. Stir in veggies and seasoning; cook for 4 min, or until veggies are soft. Remove from heat.
When rice is cooked, add to the pan; stir to combine.
Divide into 4 bowls. Top each bowl with 2 tbsp of sour cream and add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens and 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Louisiana Seasoning (1011503)
summary: A Cajun-inspired seasoning that brings the flavour with a medium-spice level.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
